verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; with the Nehiloth. A Psalm of David. Give ear <WH238> to my words <WH561>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, Consider <WH995> my meditation <WH1901>.
Hearken <WH7181> unto the voice <WH6963> of my cry <WH7773>, my King <WH4428>, and my God <WH430>; For unto thee do I pray <WH6419>.
O Jehovah <WH3068>, in the morning <WH1242> shalt thou hear <WH8085> my voice <WH6963>; In the morning <WH1242> will I order <WH6186> my prayer unto thee <WH6822>, and will keep watch.
For thou art not a God <WH410> that hath pleasure <WH2655> in wickedness <WH7562>: Evil <WH7451> shall not sojourn with thee <WH1481>.
The arrogant <WH1984> shall not stand <WH3320> in thy sight <WH5869>: Thou hatest <WH8130> all workers <WH6466> of iniquity <WH205>.
Thou wilt destroy <WH6> them that speak <WH1696> lies <WH3577>: Jehovah <WH3068> abhorreth <WH8581> the blood-thirsty <WH1818> and deceitful <WH4820> man <WH376>.

But as for me <WH7230>, in the abundance of thy lovingkindness <WH2617> will I come <WH935> into thy house <WH1004>: In thy fear <WH3374> will I worship <WH7812> toward thy holy <WH6944> temple <WH1964>.
Lead <WH5148> me <WH3068>, O Jehovah, in thy righteousness <WH6666> because of mine enemies <WH8324>; Make thy way <WH1870> straight <WH3474> before my face <WH6440>.

For there is no faithfulness <WH3559> in their mouth <WH6310>; Their inward <WH7130> part is very wickedness <WH1942>; Their throat <WH1627> is an open <WH6605> sepulchre <WH6913>; They flatter <WH2505> with their tongue <WH3956>.

Hold them guilty <WH816>, O God <WH430>; Let them fall <WH5307> by their own counsels <WH4156>; Thrust them out <WH5080> in the multitude <WH7230> of their transgressions <WH6588>; For they have rebelled against thee <WH4784>.

But let all those that take refuge <WH2620> in thee rejoice <WH8055>, Let them ever <WH5769> shout for joy <WH7442>, because thou defendest <WH5526> them <WH157>: Let them also that love thy name <WH8034> be joyful in thee <WH5970>.
For thou wilt bless <WH1288> the righteous <WH6662>; O Jehovah <WH3068>, thou wilt compass <WH5849> him with favor <WH7522> as with a shield <WH6793>.
